extension.description:
Yacoub's Subs - Premium subtitles
Your ultimate subtitle solution with extensive language support: ✅ 40+ languages (English, Arabic, Spanish, French, German, Japanese, etc.) ✅ Movies, TV Shows, and Anime ✅ Specialized Arabic Anime support (28+ subs per episode)
Powered by 3 premium providers: OpenSubtitles, SubDL, SubSource
Features: Fast and reliable subtitle search with user-configurable API credentials.
Created and maintained by Yacoub.
extension.news: v6.4.0: Streamlined to 3 premium providers (OpenSubtitles, SubDL, SubSource) with user-configurable API credentials. Enter your own API keys in settings for full access.
